pages.text: $(li)The Stronghold is a big Dungeon that can be found over the Overworld using the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/end_portal)Ender Eyes$(/l).$(br)$(li)It's a dangerous and big place with some hide loot in its interior, so it's advisable to explore it completely.$(br)$(li)You can easily find the End Portal in this structure using the $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/endolocator)Endolocator$(/l).
